system.effect: The character splits their attack to make two close atacks against separate targets within reach (or they can focus a single nutack on a single target). Make a single Melee check and compare ti to the targets' Melee defenses. On a success, the affected target takes half regular damage. On a Fantastic success, the affected target takes full damage, and the character can make a bonus attack with this power against any target within reach, with the same effect.
